theme: Seductive bartender turned slow Tuesdays into $60 — neon lights, smoky eyes, TV glowing like a boudoir set

avatar_style.persona: Rebellious, street-smart character who discovered underground money-making method
avatar_style.wardrobe: Casual, relatable clothing that signals 'regular person who cracked the code'
avatar_style.setting: Gritty, authentic workplace setting - dim lighting, real environment not staged

script.speaker: host
script.line: They said I couldn't make money off dead air. Last Tuesday? $60. Cash.
script.broll_cue: dramatic reveal of money in hand, TV glowing in background

script.speaker: host
script.line: This place was dead. Slow Tuesdays killed me. I was making barely enough for gas, just waiting for my shift to end.
script.broll_cue: authentic struggle story, bored/tired look, empty bar/venue

script.speaker: host
script.line: Then I found it. This loophole. Most places have these dead screens, right? What if... what if you could turn that into a money printer?
script.broll_cue: showing the method - phone coming out, looking at a blank TV

script.speaker: host
script.line: My boss thinks this TV just plays sports. He has NO idea I'm running an entire underground economy on it. Local spots, artists, even the bakery down the street? They pay for screen time.
script.broll_cue: demonstrating trillboards setup with QR scan, then TV displaying local promos

script.speaker: host
script.line: That $60 on Tuesday? Rookie numbers. Last month, I pulled in an extra $247. This week, looking at $180 just from this one spot. And my boss? Still clueless.
script.broll_cue: counting money secretly, quick glimpse of a Trillboards earnings dashboard mock-up

script.speaker: host
script.line: This isn't for everyone. You need access to a TV screen. But if you're like me, with a dead screen staring back at you... you're sitting on a goldmine. The system won't tell you this.
script.broll_cue: call to action, conspiratorial whisper to camera, TV glowing with content

caption_overlay.text: Made $60 on a dead Tuesday doing THIS
This TV is a cash machine
They don't want you to know

trillboards_touchpoints.action: QR code scan on workplace TV
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Takes 30 seconds to set up passive income
Proof of concept with real numbers

metrics_hypothesis.shareability_notes: Controversial angle + specific money claims + FOMO

alt_hooks: I made $247 this month and my boss is clueless
This side hustle only works if you have TV access
Your workplace is sitting on money and doesn't know it

rights_and_clearance_notes: Edgy but legal content - focus on legitimate unused screen monetization

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Dramatic close-up of a person in a dim, slightly gritty bar/workplace setting, looking bored and tired. They then subtly pull out a small wad of cash and count it with a shocked/excited expression. A glowing, slightly out-of-focus TV screen is visible in the background.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Establish the struggle and then the glimpse of secret money. Maintain low-key, authentic setting.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Close-up, handheld style, slight shake for authenticity.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Continue from last frame. Person looks around cautiously, pulls out their phone. Close-up on their face, a sly, rebellious smile. Then a quick shot of them opening a sleek, minimalist app (representing Trillboards) on their phone.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Maintain secretive atmosphere, focus on the phone as the tool for the 'hack'.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Over-shoulder shot focusing on the phone screen, then quick cut to the person's expressive face.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Continue from last frame. The TV screen in the bar/workplace suddenly displays a dynamic QR code. The person quickly, almost furtively, scans it with their phone, glancing around as if avoiding detection. Immediately after, the TV screen transforms, showing vibrant, rotating 'local promos' content.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Build tension of secret operation, show immediate, effortless transformation of the TV.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Quick cuts between the phone and TV, with close-ups on the QR scan process.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Continue from last frame. The person is now relaxed, a confident, slightly mischievous smirk on their face. Close-up on their phone screen showing a mock Trillboards earnings dashboard with increasing numbers ($60, then $180, then $247). They discreetly pocket a wad of cash, looking directly at the camera with a knowing wink.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Reveal the payoff and success, break the fourth wall for intimacy and exclusivity.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Close-up on the phone screen then a quick, confident move to the face for the wink.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Continue from last frame. The person gestures broadly towards the now-active TV screen, which is displaying various attractive local offers and events. They lean in conspiratorially, as if sharing a huge secret. The final shot is a confident, slightly defiant look towards the camera, with the active TV in the background.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: End on a high note of opportunity and exclusivity, reinforce the 'forbidden knowledge' aspect.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Wide shot showing the person and the active TV, then a final close-up on the person's face for the conspiratorial lean.
